      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      id - the id of a product to delete

    • getAllProductsForPeriod

      Parameters:

      endDate - the end of the period

      all products produced ruring the given period

    • getAllProductsOfTypeForPeriod

      @GetMapping("/get/of-type/{tid}/of-period/{sd}/{ed}") public List<ProductEntity> getAllProductsOfTypeForPeriod(@PathVariable("sd") @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime startDate, @PathVariable("ed") @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime endDate, @PathVariable("tid") Integer typeId)

    • getProductionTypeGroupedOfMonth

      @GetMapping("/get-statistics/of-month/{d}") public List<ProductionStatisticsResponse> getProductionTypeGroupedOfMonth(@PathVariable("d") @DateTimeFormat(pattern="yyyy-MM") YearMonth date)
      Gets type-grouped sums of products produced during a given month
      Parameters:
      date - the month
      Returns:
      type-grouped sums of products produced during a given month

    • getProductionTypeGroupedOfWeek

      @GetMapping("/get-statistics/of-week/{d}") public List<ProductionStatisticsResponse> getProductionTypeGroupedOfWeek(@PathVariable("d") @DateTimeFormat(pattern="yyyy-MM-dd") LocalDate date)
      Gets type-grouped sums of products produced during a given week specified by a day. For example 2024.03.13 is wednesday, so the week will be 2024.03.11 00:00 - 2024.03.18 00:00
      Parameters:
      date - the week (day of the week)
      Returns:
      type-grouped sums of products produced during a given week

    • getProductionTypeGroupedOfDay

      @GetMapping("/get-statistics/of-day/{d}") public List<ProductionStatisticsResponse> getProductionTypeGroupedOfDay(@PathVariable("d") @DateTimeFormat(pattern="yyyy-MM-dd") LocalDate date)
      Gets type-grouped sums of products produced during a given day
      Parameters:
      date - the day
      Returns:
      type-grouped sums of products produced during a given day

    • getProductionTypeGroupedForPeriod
